name: myawesomebot
description: A bot that will notify on call developers when P0 tickets open, escalate and resolve and sends reminders on an interval

scripts.start: CLIENT_ID=${CLIENT_ID} CLIENT_SECRET=${CLIENT_SECRET} PORT=${PORT} SLACK_TOKEN=${SLACK_TOKEN} PAGER_DUTY_TOKEN=${PAGER_DUTY_TOKEN} node index.js

author: Henry Jetmundsen
